source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Frostbolt Volley dealing 774,948 damage to your primary target and 140,985 damage to up to 8 additional targets. Casting Icy Veins always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Icy Veins causes you to hit a Jackpot! at 100% effectiveness every 10 sec for 30 sec.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.

spells.description: Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 8,150 to 9,961 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 302 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,718, further increased by 977 while you remain within its light.

name: Blastfurious Machete
description: The word 'Family' is etched into its hilt.
